TopicTitle: No active Vessel when switching from Debris to Ship

Articles.Content:
Hi! I have been running into this bug a few times now. Simply look at this picture:

> ![75RcR18.png](http://i.imgur.com/75RcR18.png)

Nothing is there, no vehicle, everything is zero.

Installed Mods:

![6MSnQSV.png](http://i.imgur.com/6MSnQSV.png)

Here's the output\_log.txt: [https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1414175/output_log.zero-crash.txt](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/1414175/output_log.zero-crash.txt)

Everything seems to be fine until about Line 56600. Then, Kerbal Alarm Clock and Kerbal Engineer Redux seem to start logspamming with NullReferenceException's but I guess that's a symptom and not actually the cause.

Has anyone ever seen this?
